meanings.definition: The anterior part of the upper jaw in vertebrates.
meanings.sent1: The premaxilla is the front part of the upper jaw.
meanings.sent2: In many animals, the premaxilla holds the front teeth.
meanings.sent3: The premaxilla likes to be at the forefront of jaw structures.
meanings.sent4: The premaxilla is like the gatekeeper of the upper jaw.
meanings.sent5: The premaxilla is like the welcoming doorman of the upper jaw.

meanings.definition: A bone forming the anterior part of the upper jaw in vertebrates.
meanings.sent1: The premaxilla bone is important for the front of the upper jaw.
meanings.sent2: Animals rely on the premaxilla bone for their jaw structure.
meanings.sent3: The premaxilla bone enjoys being a key player in the upper jaw.
meanings.sent4: The premaxilla bone is the foundation of the upper jaw's front part.
meanings.sent5: The premaxilla bone is like the cornerstone of the upper jaw.
